Smart Tape Dispenser: A tape dispenser that can detect the type of tape being used and dispense it automatically, saving time and reducing the risk of errors.
Tape Dispenser with Box: A tape dispenser that includes an attached box for storing and organizing rolls of tape, making it easy to access and use.

Tape Dispenser with Box and Digital Display: A tape dispenser that includes an attached box for storing and organizing rolls of tape, as well as a digital display that shows the amount of tape remaining on the roll and the time it has been running.

Tape Dispenser with Audio Alert: A tape dispenser that includes an audio alert that sounds when the roll of tape runs out, allowing the user to quickly replace it without having to manually check the amount of tape remaining.
Tape Dispenser with Multiple Tape Holders: A tape dispenser that includes multiple holders for storing and dispensing different types of tape, making it easy to switch between them as needed.
